content: Discover the Burgh - Sharing the Best of Pittsburgh, PA Skip to content Need a Pittsburgh real estate agent? Get in touch with our friends at the Melinda Lynch Team today! Welcome to Discover the Burgh, your guide to the best things to see, do, eat, and experience in Pittsburgh and southwest Pennsylvania. We are Jeremy and Angie, and we started Discover the Burgh in 2015 with the quest to do everything in the region. To date, we have personally experienced over 1,400 unique finds and try out new spots every week! So come Discover the Burgh with us and find a new favorite experience today! What You ll Find on Discover the Burgh We have one goal here at Discover the Burgh- to find the best things to do in Pittsburgh, personally experience them by visiting ourselves, and share them with others looking to do the same. On this site, you ll find all of the experiences we ve had in dedicated reviews (like our Primanti Brothers, Heinz History Center, or Wigle Whiskey reviews), topical roundups such as our Pittsburgh breweries or Pittsburgh restaurants guides, in-depth neighborhood guides, exploration quests (such as our goal of finding the best pizza or tacos in Pittsburgh ), Pittsburgh hotel reviews, and so much more.
